.`` I think what a lot of people don't know is the duality that Steve Carell lives in, which is he's incredibly funny, but he's not like a jokester,'' he says. He's a very reserved, very gentleman-like guy. He leads by example: when days are long, if it's going to get to one person, it's going to get to him and he never lets anybody see him sweat, so because of that we all band together. And at the same time when he turns it on for the show, he's truly, deadly funny. I think he's got some of the sharpest wit I've ever known. Howard Stern to David Letterman : sorry about your sex scandal( video) Instead of deflecting Howard Stern 's apology, David Letterman responded with candor and a bit of reciprocal praise. `` You have been very, very nice to me on the radio and viciously ugly to me on the radio and I except both with equanimity because I know a little bit about how you operate and I'm still fond of your talent and your ability and what you've represented to the United States of America-and of course, the world.
